entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 5:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 9.3°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain or rain overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of ice pellets. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
